title: The Secret Player
description: The protagonist Alexander Cooke, known as Sander, becomes a favorite performer of women's roles on the London stage, where only males are allowed to act. A dangerous secret: Sander was born female. She is at risk of flogging or even death if her identity is discovered. A few suspect the truth, including William Shakespeare and Queen Elizabeth. Adding to her risks, she and the poet John Donne fall in love. In life and onstage, Sander Cooke dares to challenge the status quo.
author: Jinny Webber
